sentences.sContent: Eight goldfish are all orange and one is black .
sentences.sContent_eng: Eight goldfish are all orange and one is black .
sentences.sCn: 八条金鱼都是桔黄色的，只有一条是黑的。

sentences.sContent: As in the case of the goldfish, one can use either picture as a model of the universe.
sentences.sContent_eng: As in the case of the goldfish, one can use either picture as a model of the universe.
sentences.sCn: 同碗中金鱼的情形仿佛，一个人可以用两幅图画中的任一一张作为宇宙之模式。

phrases.pCn: 金鱼缸（无法躲开众人耳目的地方）

trans.tranOther: a small shiny orange fish often kept as a pet
